path: artifacts/Swinate Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.Swinate: contracts/Swinate Full Smart Contract Security Audit/Swinate

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can lead to OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if the excluded addresses list is long.
findings.location: `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` functions in the Swinate contract
